name: virtualize.sh
content:
#!/bin/bash

wget --recursive --continue --no-directories --no-parent --directory-prefix=environment ${DCI_ENVIRONMENT_URL}

git clone https://github.com/enovance/infra-virt.git
virtualenv --system-site-packages venv

source venv/bin/activate
pip install -r infra-virt/requirements.txt

export PYTHONPATH=infra-virt
# Disabled to speed up the demo
echo ./infra-virt/virtualize.sh environment
